Plot: Haitian couple who work on a sugar cane plantation in the Dominican Republic escape the desperate conditions of the 'bateyes' (cane cutters' communities) and make their way back to Haiti.
Title: Haïti chérie
Writer: Mario Cabrera Lima, Claudio Del Punta, Romina Ganduglia
Actors: Juan Carlos Campos, Amin Capellan, Yeraini Cuevas, Jean Marie Guerin
